concludeQuestions.improve: We need to increase measurement accuracy and precision

consistent-reason.value: 3 is a good number to get a trend of measurement precision and accuracy. Less than 3 may not be very representative, more than 3 will incur more time and cost. The general rule, we need minimum 3 data points to plot a graph.

evenly-space-reason.value: We should select sampling locations representative to the whole dune, but not in excessive numbers. Optimum number of sampling locations are to be identified so that we get the required data, but no excessive analysis.

familiarity.value: I am not familiar with any features
